sentences.en: "Simply being on antipsychotic medications could not have brought about such acceptance, " she stressed. "And this acceptance set me free psychologically.
sentences.cn: “单纯的服用抗精神病药物不能诱使这种接受态度，”她强调“这种接受让我心理上释放了。

sentences.en: And, psychologically, I think people are very , very devastated.
sentences.cn: 另外, 从心理上而言, 我认为人们也已深受打击.

sentences.en: Boys mature more slowly than girls, both physically and psychologically.
sentences.cn: 在生理和心理上,男孩比女孩成熟得晚些.

sentences.en: Fear of falling is treatable, both physically and psychologically, Dr.
sentences.cn: 担心摔倒是可以从身体上和心理上得到治疗的.

sentences.en: I have experienced more pains psychologically than my peers.
sentences.cn: 比起同龄人,我遭受了更多的心灵创伤.

sentences.en: My associate Helmut Sonnenfeldt was psychologically more adept.
sentences.cn: 我的同事赫尔穆特·索南费尔特比较善于揣摩心理.

sentences.en: One factor is that smokers depend psychologically on cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 一是烟民在心理上依赖于香烟.

sentences.en: Psychologically there are two dangers be guarded against in old age.
sentences.cn: 在精神生活方面老年人有两个方面的危险因素需要注意.

sentences.en: Psychologically there are two dangers to be guarded against in old age.
sentences.cn: 从心理上说,老年时期要防止两种危险.

sentences.en: Psychologically, would that not enhance Cowperwood's standing as a financier?
sentences.cn: 在心理上是不是会抬高柯帕乌作为一金融家的身价 呢 ?

sentences.en: The event was very damaging to the child psychologically.
sentences.cn: 这件事会对孩子的心理造成很大的伤害.

sentences.en: The looping structure of the book tries to work that out psychologically in its hearers.
sentences.cn: 这本书的环状结构,试图在听众的心理上达到那种目的。

sentences.en: This explanation fits the facts and is psychologically plausible.
sentences.cn: 这一解释与事实相符,从心理角度看也有理.

sentences.en: This position was logically sound, but not psychologically.
sentences.cn: 这一立场从逻辑上是正确的, 但从心理上讲则不然.

sentences.en: To become confused or psychologically unbalanced.
sentences.cn: 使困惑或心理上失去平衡.

sentences.en: What you are doing psychologically is expanding your boudaries.
sentences.cn: 你心里所做的正是扩展你的领域.

sentences.en: You notice the noise because it affects you psychologically.
sentences.cn: 你之所以意识到这些噪声,是因为受到了心理的影响.

words.tran_cn: 精神分析的；心理分析的
心理的；心理学的；精神上的
精神分析学家；心理分析学家
[心理] 心理发生；精神发生
心理测验；心理测定学；心灵占卜术
